verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: held] [ARG1: a joint press conference] [ARGM-TMP: today] [ARG2: with Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari] , and at one point , the African leader was asked about Trump 's infamous comments about " sh*thole countries . "

President Trump held a joint press conference today with Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari , and at one point , the African leader [V: was] asked about Trump 's infamous comments about " sh*thole countries . "
